title: What Girls Know About Grids: For Leslie Gore, Mo Tucker, Laura Nyro, and Ma Cass
medium: Multiple of eight etching and relief etchings on handmade Japanese paper attached back-to-back, folded and tied with twine, and four photograph on machine-made resin-coated paper
dimensions: composition and sheet: (unfolded): various dimensions, from 8 7/8 x 8/78" (22.5 x 22.5 cm) to  13 3/4 x 12 11/16" (35 x 32.2 cm); Photographs: each 3 1/2 x 3 9/16" (8.9 x 9 cm)
credits: Acquired through the generosity of Marian and James H. Cohen in memory of their son Michael Harrison Cohen
